name: poscloud-api
description: SISTEMA DE VENTA EN LA NUBE

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/ BASE_URL_V8=http://localhost:308 nodemon index.js
scripts.eldesafio: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/ BASE_URL_V8=http://192.168.2.108:308 nodemon index.js
scripts.granpaso: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/ BASE_URL_V8=http://192.168.88.90:308 nodemon index.js
scripts.jacksonburgs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/ BASE_URL_V8=http://192.168.0.88:308 nodemon index.js
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/ BASE_URL_V8=https://api-v2.poscloud.ar nodemon --exec 'node --max-old-space-size=4096' index.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/ BASE_URL_V8=https://d-api-v2.poscloud.ar nodemon --exec 'node --max-old-space-size=4096' index.js

author: POS Cloud
